【华为董事长：#华为鸿蒙系统是否用于手机还未确定# 安卓仍是手机OS首选】Huawei seeks to reduce the latency of its Internet of Things (IoT) devices through it's own Hongmeng Operating System (OS), according to the company's chairman Liang Hua. "In terms of smartphones, we are still u ​  展开全文c 
                    【华为董事长：#华为鸿蒙系统是否用于手机还未确定# 安卓仍是手机OS首选】Huawei seeks to reduce the latency of its Internet of Things (IoT) devices through it's own Hongmeng Operating System (OS), according to the company's chairman Liang Hua. "In terms of smartphones, we are still using the Android operating system and ecosystem as a 'first choice'," he added as a response to the highly-discussed rumor that Hongmeng is going to replace Android as a back-up plan against U.S. sanctions. "We haven't decided yet if the Hongmeng OS can be developed as a smartphone operating system in the future,” he explained. Liang made the remarks during a company press conference on Friday, three days after the U.S. government announced its decision to allow American companies to sell products to Huawei. For more: O网页链接 收起全文d

                    【华为鸿蒙是物联网OS，华为手机仍以 Android 为首选】7 月 12 日消息，据新浪科技报道，在今日的华为《2018年可持续发展报告》发布会上，华为董事长梁华在谈及鸿蒙系统时表示，这是为物联网开发的操作系统，是否发展为手机系统还未确定。据悉，这款系统目前将为物联网而开发，将用于自动驾驶、远程医疗等低时延场景，目前华为手机还是会将 Android 系统以及其生态作为首选。#华为鸿蒙系统是否用于手机还未确定# 收起全文d
